How to Buy a Yacht with Bitcoin
Designed by the renowned Naval Architect Gregory C. Marshall, the CRESCENT 117 features a contemporary, elegant exterior and an interior that will stand the test of time.
The motor yachts interior features a clean, contemporary styling, which is complemented by high-quality joinery and beautiful modern fabrics and soft goods.
The CRESCENT 117 offers five sumptuous staterooms, which accommodate 10 guests in plush comfort.
KHALILAH is designed to tick all the boxes of what owners are looking for in a superyacht; she doesnt compromise on speed, efficiency, comfort, or space.
Her spacious aft deck and funky interior have helped her become a very popular charter yacht in the Mediterranean.
KHALILAHs interior blends contemporary chic with a distinct Asian influence.

How to Buy Litecoin (LTC) with Apple Pay
Scan the QR code to download the app. It is 100% free.
Tap "Buy Crypto" on the app home screen to buy crypto with Apple Pay.
Enter your desired amount and choose a cryptocurrency to buy.
Select Apple Pay as your payment method in the BitPay app.
Choose offers from Simplex or Wyre to complete your Apple Pay transaction.

How to Buy Airline Tickets with Bitcoin & Cryptocurrency
Sign up for the BitPay Card to pay for flights and the rest of your travel expenses with crypto.

Pay for airline tickets from your crypto wallet. Pay using Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Shiba Inu Coin (SHIB), Litecoin (LTC), Dai (DAI), Binance USD (BUSD), USD Coin (USDC), Wrapped Bitcoin (WBTC), Pax Dollar (USDP) and Gemini Dollar (GUSD).
